articles.content:
Employees of Wuhan MY CAR Technology Investment Group deliver disinfectant to Central China Normal University. The employees, from Chinas western Xinjiang region, have been held up by Chinas state media as an example of generosity during the virus outbreak.

The commodity-linked Canadian dollar weakened to a four-month low against its U.S. counterpart on Monday as worries that the coronavirus outbreak would slow the domestic economy overshadowed stronger-than-expected housing data.
